title: @riot why does pyke and irelia rework not have champion insights?
body: i enjoy looking at the insights seeing what the champion could've been and the nice concept artwork, and i noticed irelia and pyke didnt get those on their release.

replies.body:
Irelia had an entire mini-documentary on the League of Legends YouTube channel about the behind-the-scenes processes that came with her rework. I'm not sure about Pyke though, there hasn't been any updates on the Nexus page as of now.

Regarding Irelia, same thing happened with Rakan and Xayah, they didn't have their own champion insights article but they did have their "creative collaboration" mini-documentary.

But yeah, I really do enjoy those articles, seeing how these champions came to be and how they've shifted conceptually throughout their projects. It's always good to see the thought and consideration that goes behind making and/or remaking the champions we all love.
